description:
For focused workouts that yield results, you can't beat the consistency and accuracy of power-based training. And this unit is as low-profile and lightweight as a power meter gets – 15g, with a minimalist housing and sleek front profile. ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart compatibility make it good to go with pretty much any major GPS or cycling computer on the planet. The 3rd generation Stages power meter is more accurate, has an upgraded antenna and now features an LED light to confirm calibration and battery level.

  • Pre-mounted to Shimano's GRX RX810 non-drive crank arm. Be sure to select the correct length
  • Compatible with Shimano GRX cranksets
  • Upgraded electronics for improved signal strength
  • IPX 7 waterproofing
  • Power is measured in kilograms and converted to Watts
  • Accelerometer-based cadence keeps your bike uncluttered
  • Specifications: accuracy: ± 1.5%; power range (Watts): 0 to 5000; cadence range (rpm): 10-220
  • Software compatibility: Stages Link, Training Peaks, Strava, Garmin Training Center and others
  • Replaceable battery included
  • Fits most bike frames; check Stages fit guide for details
name: Stages Power LFT GRX RX810 Power Meter
